pages.text: $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/building-wands)Building Wands$(/l) is a powerful building tool that is the most feature rich building wand I have seen. There is a good guide to using the wands on the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/building-wands)Building Wands Curseforge$(/l) page.
